text: Shinkō suru mono yo, moshi anata gata no naka kara oshie ni somuki saru mono ga areba, yagate arrā wa,-min o mede rare, kare-ra mo omo o keiai suru yōna soto no min o tsurete ko rarerudearou. Kare-ra wa shinja ni tai shite wa kenkyodearuga, fushinjin-sha ni taishite wa ishikengo de chikaradzuyoku, arrā no michi no tame ni funtō doryoku shi, hinan-sha no waru ro o kesshite osorenai. Kore wa, arrā ga o konomi ni nara reta mono ni atae rareru onkeidearu. Arrā wa atsu Shi ni shite zenchi de ara reru
